content: Hello all; I am new here- and have a specific question: I have an app developed on Allscripts Unity but looking to port the app to SMART on FHIR and I was looking for someone with experience doing this (I want to make the app EMR agnostic). Would any of you know where the appropriate place would be to find such expertise or post an opportunity? THX
Asking here is fine. If you're actually looking to hire someone, PM @Grahame Grieve and he can post something to #work opportunities on your behalf.

Lloyd McKenzie said:

Asking here is fine. If you're actually looking to hire someone, PM Grahame Grieve and he can post something to #work opportunities on your behalf.

Thanks!
